Method Detail

getTree

public SiteTree getTree(DocumentIdentityMap map,
                        Publication publication,
                        java.lang.String area)
                 throws SiteException
Returns the sitetree for a specific area of this publication. Sitetrees are created on demand and are cached.

Parameters:
map - The document identity map.
publication - The publication.
area - The area.
Returns:
A site tree.
Throws:
SiteException - if an error occurs.
